alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:18PM CDT until August 11 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL SHELBY COUNTY... At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shelby County Airport, or near Calera, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Montevallo, Shelby County Airport, American Village, Camp Branch, Saddle Lake Farms, Alabaster Veterans Park, Bounds Lake and Saginaw. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
